column5: Just wondering if anyone know a place I can get a couple good quality fuji sic tips for a couple rods I have? I need ot replace one on one of my St.Croix's and one of my shimano's. Looking for something in the east endof toronto preferably. Aikman's is a bit of pita for me to get to.

Is there an Angling Specialties out your way?  I've been to the Mississauga location, as well as the Jane/7 location and both seem like good bets for that sort of thing.  I thought there was a Scarborough store as well....?
I think the scarb one is closed
Maybe check with Tightlines. There's a tackle shop on Shepard by Midland, you could try there as well.
We have a good selection at GAGNONS  Dave

Ended up driving up to concord t angling spcialties. Two tips the perfect size and some high strength hot glu for 10 bucks. Tips are on and I am a happy camper. I think I am going to pick up some epoxy to cover up the edge of the new guides, or should I use clear nail pollish?
